connect20/nfusionsolutions_nfusionwidget.name: connect20/Nfusionsolutions_NfusionWidgets

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/nfusionsolutions_nfusionwidget.description: This extension adds the capability in Magento to add Precious Metals Pricing Widgets to your site using nFusion Solutions' reliable, enterprise-class cloud platform for global financial data.
